text: Mario Ardizzon (2 January 1938 - 30 November 2012) was an Italian footballer. Ardizzon was born in Chioggia, and played 10 seasons (253 games, 3 goals) in the Serie A for S.S.C. Venezia, A.S. Roma and Bologna F.C. 1909.
